snippet.title: A Difficult Game About Climbing - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Play it now! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2497920/A_Difficult_Game_About_Climbing/

A Difficult Game About Climbing is a challenging climbing game inspired by Getting Over It With Bennett Foddy (one of my all-time favorites).

Watch out for slippery surfaces and other hazards as you make your way towards the peak. Eternal glory and a wonderful gift awaits all climbers who manage to reach the top!

I personally feel that this genre of games has been severely underserved and sold short with games that focus mainly on being frustrating rather than proposing a fun, interesting, simple yet real challenge. With this in mind, I have made my best effort to create a unique and memorable experience, hoping to contribute to the spirit of a "Foddian Type" game genre.
